h2_title: Where To Use The Pungent Flesh Chunk in Black Myth: Wukong
content: The Pungent Flesh Chunk **can be used in the caves beneath the King of Flowing Sand and Second Rat Prince arena**. From the Shrine in the arena, head through the caves and take a left when it opens up. On your left you will find a cliff edge where you can use the Pungent Flesh Chunk.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Pungent_Flesh_Chunk.md', within the main section titled 'Pungent Flesh Chunk', specifically from the subsection 'Where To Use The Pungent Flesh Chunk in Black Myth: Wukong'.
The content is as follows:
The Pungent Flesh Chunk **can be used in the caves beneath the King of Flowing Sand and Second Rat Prince arena**. From the Shrine in the arena, head through the caves and take a left when it opens up. On your left you will find a cliff edge where you can use the Pungent Flesh Chunk.
